snippet: After adopting the platform of Continental Airlines, with which it merged, United Airlines experienced flight delays and problems with kiosks at airports across the system.
abstract: United Airlines battles service problems including flight delays and faulty airport kiosks as it works to combine the United and Continental Airlines reservations systems; companies merge to form the world's largest carrier, now known as United Airlines.
lead_paragraph: After adopting the platform of Continental Airlines, with which it merged, United Airlines experienced flight delays and problems with kiosks at airports across the system.

headline.seo: United Airlines’ Reservation System Causes Delays
headline.main: New Reservation System Causes Delays for United
headline.print_headline: New Reservation System Causes Delays for United
